root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-6-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

Data for this indicator is available for 157 countries and territories.

Time series:

Country data for this indicator is available as of 2000 in the SDG Indicators Global Database, but longer time series are available in ILOSTAT. Regional data in this submission covers a period of 2005 to 2019.

Disaggregation:

No disaggregation is specifically required for this indicator, although having it disaggregated by sex is desirable, as is disaggregation by detailed age groups within the youth age band.
